channel.title: Can't run server's run.bat | Delta ++
channel.description:
Hi i'm new to coding rsps, when i try to run the run.bat i get this error: [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: com/rs2/Serve r : Unsupported major.minor version 51.0 at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClassCond(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$000(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: com.rs2.Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
And this is what the run.bat looks like when i edit it. [code]@echo off cd bin java -Xmx512m com.rs2.Server pause[/code]

item.title: Can't run server's run.bat | Delta ++
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

You’re using JRE/JDK 6 instead of 7. Change the path for java direction to the newest Java in the run.bat and you should be good.

Read full topic

item.title: Can't run server's run.bat | Delta ++
item.dc:creator: @Yesteryear Yesteryear
item.description:
@Yesteryear wrote:

Update java and recompile

Read full topic

item.title: Can't run server's run.bat | Delta ++

item.description:
@Basix wrote:

Hi i’m new to coding rsps, when i try to run the run.bat i get this error:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: com/rs2/Serve r : Unsupported major.minor version 51.0 at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClassCond(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$000(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: com.rs2.Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .

And this is what the run.bat looks like when i edit it.

@echo off cd bin java -Xmx512m com.rs2.Server pause
